title: Men's Polo Shirts Long Sleeve Striped Dry Fit Casual Collared Pique Golf Polo Shirts for Men
description: QUALITY MATERIAL: Our mens polo shirts made from cotton blend and spandex, soft, lightweight, stretch, breathable to wear, keeps you comfortable and still have good shape after wash.
STYLISH FEATURES: Wearing our polo shirts for men with stylish stripes, collar placket, contrast lapel collar, long sleeve, regular fit, no pilling and no shrunk, fashion and modern look.

SIZE AND COLOR: Casual mens long sleeve polo shirts, based on classic fit u.s size: S, M, L, XL, XXL, 3XL with various stripes colors: pink yellow red grey green navy blue purple that you can have different look everyday.

OCCASION: Our long sleeve shirt for men are perfect for casual, business, daily wear, sports, work, holiday, travel etc. Also cool for weekend, great gifts for husband,families, boyfriend and friends.

WARM TIPS: This long sleeve polo shirts for men, the model is 5'11"height, 172lbs wearing a size medium for reference. Please refer to the size chart in product image or description before you order it.
